channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: The heat up begins! Sunny skies today with highs in the 80s,
item.description: The heat up begins! Sunny skies today with highs in the 80s, some areas tipping into the 90s. We will continue to heat up into the weekend, with some possibly record breaking heat on Saturday. #ktvzweather

item.title: A Washington County man was sentenced to more than 10 years
item.description: A Washington County man was sentenced to more than 10 years in federal prison Wednesday for distributing counterfeit pills containing fentanyl that resulted in a woman's overdose death.

item.title: A West Virginia boy died after a collision during football p
item.description: A West Virginia boy died after a collision during football practice. Itâ€™s the third student football player death this month.
